PCI.Name: PC Importer
PCI.ImportDialog.TITLE: Import PC
PCI.ImportDialog.CONTENT: You may import data for this Actor from an XML or JSON export created from a different system.
PCI.ImportDialog.Update.CONTENT: This operation will update the data for the Actor and cannot be un-done.
PCI.ImportDialog.Create.CONTENT: This operation will create a new Actor.
PCI.Import.BUTTON: Import a PC character sheet from another system or character sheet
